wybug_title: 腾讯又一站点数据库报错致敏感信息泄露。
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2012-04-06：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2012-04-06：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2012-04-16：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2012-04-26：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2012-05-06：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2012-05-21：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 腾讯又一站点数据库报错致敏感信息泄露。详情看图，看XX不多说了。 详细说明：  
http://b.qq.com/activity/activity_110601_02.htmlWarning: include(/data/bizapp/htdocs_crm2_php//module/activity_sidebar.php) [function.include]: failed to open stream: No such file or directory in /data/bizapp/htdocs_crm2_php/activity/activity_110601_02.php on line 18Warning: include() [function.include]: Failed opening '/data/bizapp/htdocs_crm2_php//module/activity_sidebar.php' for inclusion (include_path='.:/php/includes:/usr/local/apache2/htdocs/zendamf_remote/:/usr/local/php/lib/php') in /data/bizapp/htdocs_crm2_php/activity/activity_110601_02.php http://b.qq.com/activity/activity_110601_01.htmlWarning: include(/data/bizapp/htdocs_crm2_php//module/activity_sidebar.php) [function.include]: failed to open stream: No such file or directory in /data/bizapp/htdocs_crm2_php/activity/activity_110601_01.php on line 18Warning: include() [function.include]: Failed opening '/data/bizapp/htdocs_crm2_php//module/activity_sidebar.php' for inclusion (include_path='.:/php/includes:/usr/local/apache2/htdocs/zendamf_remote/:/usr/local/php/lib/php') in /data/bizapp/htdocs_crm2_php/activity/activity_110601_01.php on line 18
   漏洞证明：  




Warning: include(/data/bizapp/htdocs_crm2_php//module/activity_sidebar.php) [function.include]: failed to open stream: No such file or directory in /data/bizapp/htdocs_crm2_php/activity/activity_110601_02.php on line 18Warning: include() [function.include]: Failed opening '/data/bizapp/htdocs_crm2_php//module/activity_sidebar.php' for inclusion (include_path='.:/php/includes:/usr/local/apache2/htdocs/zendamf_remote/:/usr/local/php/lib/php') in /data/bizapp/htdocs_crm2_php/activity/activity_110601_02.php

Warning: include(/data/bizapp/htdocs_crm2_php//module/activity_sidebar.php) [function.include]: failed to open stream: No such file or directory in /data/bizapp/htdocs_crm2_php/activity/activity_110601_01.php on line 18Warning: include() [function.include]: Failed opening '/data/bizapp/htdocs_crm2_php//module/activity_sidebar.php' for inclusion (include_path='.:/php/includes:/usr/local/apache2/htdocs/zendamf_remote/:/usr/local/php/lib/php') in /data/bizapp/htdocs_crm2_php/activity/activity_110601_01.php on line 18
